U (0, 0) -> (-1, 1) -> Corner(Ubl)
U (2, 0) -> (1, 1) -> Corner(Ubr)
U (0, 2) -> (-1, -1) -> Corner(Ufl)
U (2, 2) -> (1, -1) -> Corner(Ufr)
L (0, 0) -> (-1, 1) -> Corner(Lub)
L (2, 0) -> (1, 1) -> Corner(Luf)
L (0, 2) -> (-1, -1) -> Corner(Ldb)
L (2, 2) -> (1, -1) -> Corner(Ldf)
F (0, 0) -> (-1, 1) -> Corner(Ful)
F (2, 0) -> (1, 1) -> Corner(Fur)
F (0, 2) -> (-1, -1) -> Corner(Fdl)
F (2, 2) -> (1, -1) -> Corner(Fdr)
R (0, 0) -> (-1, 1) -> Corner(Ruf)
R (2, 0) -> (1, 1) -> Corner(Rub)
R (0, 2) -> (-1, -1) -> Corner(Rdf)
R (2, 2) -> (1, -1) -> Corner(Rdb)
B (0, 0) -> (-1, 1) -> Corner(Bur)
B (2, 0) -> (1, 1) -> Corner(Bul)
B (0, 2) -> (-1, -1) -> Corner(Bdr)
B (2, 2) -> (1, -1) -> Corner(Bdl)
D (0, 0) -> (-1, 1) -> Corner(Dfl)
D (2, 0) -> (1, 1) -> Corner(Dfr)
D (0, 2) -> (-1, -1) -> Corner(Dbl)
D (2, 2) -> (1, -1) -> Corner(Dbr)
